ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Just because, Patch Message.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh, they forgot a line. Corrected a bug in the /follow process that would cause your character to loop around to the right at times when following
ygData.messageBody:
>Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
>> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>> Patch process complete.
>
>> Corrected a bug in the /follow process that would cause your character
>> to loop around to the right at times when following someone.

>Hope so. This bug makes Selo's group travel really annoying.

>Kenross Cantoforjado, 46 songs, Innoruuk

Heh heh, they forgot a line.

Corrected a bug in the /follow process that would cause your character
to loop around to the right at times when following someone.

They now loop around to the left as originally intended.

;-p

Driven back to ground level,
Kit
